messages.messageBody:
helo I'm new on this site, and I just want to ask some questions. I'm
very interested in the samurai, but I don't know a lot of them, and I
hope this site will help to learn more of the samurai

how old were the cildren whenn the lesson in the samurai art started?

thee ceremonie..and fighting....

does all samurais fight?

sory my english isn't that good....but I hope you will nderstan and
anwsher my questions....

bye
